summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of BACKGRND editorial website. All core functionality working perfectly - navigation, essay display, typography, and design specifications match requirements.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with intro text and recent essays list (3 essays displayed)
Essays page displays all 5 essays with dates and excerpts
Individual essay pages load with full content and proper formatting
Back link on essay pages returns to essays list
About page displays firm information and contact email (contact@backgrnd.co)
Typography correctly uses Source Serif 4 for body text and Inter for navigation
Color scheme matches specifications (#FAFAFA background, #111111 text)
Links have simple underline hover effects (no complex animations)
All data-testid attributes present for robust testing
Responsive design and proper spacing maintained
